short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial enhancements to OneStream Community forums

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The OneCommunity website is largely optimized for first-time users; this extension improves the experience for power-users.

- alert on new forum threads (optional)
- auto-login on forums (optional)
- transform into compact layout
- highlight unanswered and "hot" threads
- dynamically hide posts with replies or from specific boards
- more actionable Notifications page

version 2.9:
- style tweaks
